DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective analysis cohort emergency care patient Beijing January 2005 December 2014 . This aim study analyze trend pre-hospital emergency care need emergency response time , intention aid government optimize medical resource improve pre-hospital emergency care .
DOC.brief_title: Trends Pre-hospital Emergency Care Spectrum Beijing From 2005 2014 : A Retrospective Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: Pre-hospital emergency care important part Emergency Medical Service ( EMS ) System , crucial patient ' life support , disability mortality rate reduction . The level pre-hospital emergency care reflect comprehensive ability organizational , management public welfare country . Beijing Emergency Center Beijing Red Cross Emergency Center charge pre-hospital emergency care Beijing , respectively subordinate Beijing government Chinese Red Cross Society . This study collect data 3,909,746 case two pre-hospital care center January , 2005 December , 2014 retrospective analyze pre-hospital emergency call demand first aid related time . The result study help government optimize medical resource ; strengthen prevention related emergency disease . The change trend pre-hospital care disease spectrum also present problem situation develop megacities like Beijing . Based meticulous work 2 center , study collect complete pre-hospital emergency care data China .
DOC.criteria: All patient treat prehospital care Beijing Emergency Medical Center Beijing Red Cross Emergency Center January 2005 December 2014 miss data duplicate record identifiable chief cause case emergency case
